title: University of Colorado Colorado Springs Student Relief Fund
description: Need-based awards for UCCS students who are not eligible for federal or state financial aid and graduated from a high school or received a GED within the United States. If the fund balance reaches $1M, the fund will be administered as a pure endowment.
marketingContent: Applicants with active Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) or Advancing Students for a Stronger Economy Tomorrow (ASSET) status are particularly encouraged to apply and will receive preference.
